summary: Completed comprehensive production-ready verification for 22G Roofing website. All 10 specified features tested and verified working correctly. Backend APIs 100% functional, frontend UI fully operational with proper phone links, maps integration, quote form, and navigation.
passed_tests: All phone number links use correct tel:+61 format (Hero, Contact page, Footer)
Google Maps button opens correct location (12 Bedford Road Blacktown)
Apple Maps button opens correct location with coordinates
Quote form submits successfully to MongoDB database
All navigation links work and scroll to top
Footer phone numbers are clickable with correct format
Hero 'Call Now' button triggers phone call
Navbar alternates between both contacts every 4 seconds
All 5 services display with correct images on services page
Backend API endpoints (6/6 passed - 100% success rate)
Quote submission and retrieval from database
Services and projects data loading correctly
Contact info API returning proper business details
